name: Rescue at Rajini Island
summary:
Embark on an epic adventure into the unknown as you search for Captain Walsh and his missing crew of adventurers; lost on an uncharted Island. Explore ancient ruins and search for evidence of a lost civilization. Gather diary entries from the crew and un-scramble foreign symbols and engravings as you follow a path of clues...but toward what answer? Find out for yourself in this exciting Hidden Object masterpiece! 
 
Engaging game-play. 
Beautiful Hidden Object scenes. 
Explore the unknown!
